name: Traversing the Void
description:
You are sent to an alien planet on a mission to find a plant. Climb and jump through the perilous terrain in your search, where the slightest misstep could send you to your untimely demise in the depths.

This is a movement based game in which the player must utilize both climbing and jumping to reach the end goal.

Made by Zenon and Hua

Music: https://tunetank.com/track/4033-broken-spaceship/

Plant model: https://www.cgtrader.com/items/3517363/download-page

Contour line effect: https://github.com/keijiro/KinoContour
